Accomplished.name: Accomplished
Accomplished.description: Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.

Act of Reprisal.name: Act of Reprisal
Act of Reprisal.description: When an adversary damages an ally within Melee range, you gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for the next successful attack you make against that adversary.

yalzg4VRmZvakshJ.name: Mark Adversary
yalzg4VRmZvakshJ.description: When an adversary damages an ally within Melee range, you gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for the next successful attack you make against that adversary.

Adept.name: Adept
Adept.description: When you Utilize an Experience, you can mark a Stress instead of spending a Hope. If you do, double your Experience modifier for that roll.

FOl7kaOG6DFWIpMm.name: Mark Stress
FOl7kaOG6DFWIpMm.description: When you Utilize an Experience, you can mark a Stress instead of spending a Hope. If you do, double your Experience modifier for that roll.

Adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
Adrenaline.description: While you're Vulnerable, add your level to your damage rolls.

HMx9uZ54mvMiH95x.name: Adrenaline
HMx9uZ54mvMiH95x.description: While you're Vulnerable, add your level to your damage rolls.

Advanced Training.name: Advanced Training
Advanced Training.description: Choose two additional level-up options for your companion.

Apex Predator.name: Apex Predator
Apex Predator.description: Before you make an attack roll against your Focus, you can spend a Hope. On a successful attack, you remove a Fear from the GM’s Fear pool.

LHDsuveQznbcFUhV.name: Spend Hope
LHDsuveQznbcFUhV.description: Before you make an attack roll against your Focus, you can spend a Hope. On a successful attack, you remove a Fear from the GM’s Fear pool.

Arcane Charge.name: Arcane Charge
Arcane Charge.description: You can gather magical energy to enhance your capabilities. When you take magic damage, you become Charged. Alternatively, you can spend 2 Hope to become Charged. When you successfully make an attack that deals magic damage while Charged, you can clear your Charge to either gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll or gain a +3 bonus to the Difficulty of a reaction roll the spell causes the target to make. You stop being Charged at your next long rest.

z49V45ir45HGHOBB.name: Charged
z49V45ir45HGHOBB.description: When you successfully make an attack that deals magic damage while Charged, you can clear your Charge to either gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll or gain a +3 bonus to the Difficulty of a reaction roll the spell causes the target to make. You stop being Charged at your next long rest.

Ascendant.name: Ascendant
Ascendant.description: Gain a permanent +4 bonus to your Severe damage threshold.

7M8UsvVweRtT3E85.name: Ascendant
7M8UsvVweRtT3E85.description: Gain a permanent +4 bonus to your Severe damage threshold.

Battlemage.name: Battlemage
Battlemage.description: You’ve focused your studies on becoming an unconquerable force on the battlefield. Gain an additional Hit Point slot.

Battle-Bonded.name: Battle-Bonded
Battle-Bonded.description: When an adversary attacks you while they’re within your companion’s Melee range, you gain a +2 bonus to your Evasion against the attack.

IZhakv6EuG8DO4a3.name: Battle Bonded
IZhakv6EuG8DO4a3.description: When an adversary attacks you while they’re within your companion’s Melee range, you gain a +2 bonus to your Evasion against the attack.

Battle Ritual.name: Battle Ritual
Battle Ritual.description: Once per long rest, before you attempt something incredibly dangerous or face off against a foe who clearly outmatches you, describe what ritual you perform or preparations you make. When you do, clear 2 Stress and gain 2 Hope.

UdZx74Vcz6ip4Plh.name: Prepare
UdZx74Vcz6ip4Plh.description: Once per long rest, before you attempt something incredibly dangerous or face off against a foe who clearly outmatches you, describe what ritual you perform or preparations you make. When you do, clear 2 Stress and gain 2 Hope.

Brilliant.name: Brilliant
Brilliant.description: Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.

Clarity of Nature.name: Clarity of Nature
Clarity of Nature.description: Once per long rest, you can create a space of natural serenity within Close range. When you spend a few minutes resting within the space, clear Stress equal to your Instinct, distributed as you choose between you and your allies.

az7YUpxy1ysn12tO.name: Clear Stress
az7YUpxy1ysn12tO.description: Once per long rest, you can create a space of natural serenity within Close range. When you spend a few minutes resting within the space, clear Stress equal to your Instinct, distributed as you choose between you and your allies.

Comaraderie.name: Comaraderie
Comaraderie.description: Your unwavering bravery is a rallying point for your allies. You can initiate a Tag Team Roll one additional time per session. Additionally, when an ally initiates a Tag Team Roll with you, they only need to spend 2 Hope to do so.

eBSXC0l2IrRb1F8f.name: Comaraderie
eBSXC0l2IrRb1F8f.description: You can initiate a Tag Team Roll one additional time per session.

Companion.name: Companion
Companion.description: You have an animal companion of your choice (at the GM’s discretion). They stay by your side unless you tell them otherwise. Take the Ranger Companion sheet. When you level up your character, choose a level-up option for your companion from this sheet as well.

Conjure Shield.name: Conjure Shield
Conjure Shield.description: You can maintain a protective barrier of magic. While you have at least 2 Hope, you add your Proficiency to your Evasion.

0i7GVOvjH6bK5AUM.name: Conjure Shield
0i7GVOvjH6bK5AUM.description: While you have at least 2 Hope, you add your Proficiency to your Evasion.

Contacts Everywhere.name: Contacts Everywhere
Contacts Everywhere.description:
Once per session, you can briefly call on a shady contact. Choose one of the following benefits and describe what brought them here to help you in this moment:

  • They provide 1 handful of gold, a unique tool, or a mundane object that the situation requires.

  • On your next action roll, their help provides a +3 bonus to the result of your Hope or Fear Die.

  • The next time you deal damage, they snipe from the shadows, adding 2d8 to your damage roll.

GZDYjtPh0lCJ5VNq.name: Use Feature
GZDYjtPh0lCJ5VNq.description:
Once per session, you can briefly call on a shady contact. Choose one of the following benefits and describe what brought them here to help you in this moment:

  • They provide 1 handful of gold, a unique tool, or a mundane object that the situation requires.

  • On your next action roll, their help provides a +3 bonus to the result of your Hope or Fear Die.

  • The next time you deal damage, they snipe from the shadows, adding 2d8 to your damage roll.

Courage.name: Courage
Courage.description: When you fail a roll with Fear, you gain a Hope.

Dark Cloud.name: Dark Cloud
Dark Cloud.description:
Make a Spellcast Roll (15). On a success, create a temporary dark cloud that covers any area within Close range. Anyone in this cloud can’t see outside of it, and anyone outside of it can’t see in. You’re considered Cloaked from any adversary for whom the cloud blocks line of sight.

@Template[type:emanation|range:c]

nIgBwYfAVAJ98lzb.name: SpellCast: Dark Cloud
nIgBwYfAVAJ98lzb.description:
Make a Spellcast Roll (15). On a success, create a temporary dark cloud that covers any area within Close range. Anyone in this cloud can’t see outside of it, and anyone outside of it can’t see in. You’re considered Cloaked from any adversary for whom the cloud blocks line of sight.

@Template[type:emanation|range:c]

Defender.name: Defender
Defender.description: Your animal transformation embodies a healing guardian spirit. When you’re in Beastform and an ally within Close range marks 2 or more Hit Points, you can mark a Stress to reduce the number of Hit Points they mark by 1.

9WxcZ3BuXUKfqUMz.name: Mark Stress
9WxcZ3BuXUKfqUMz.description: When you’re in Beastform and an ally within Close range marks 2 or more Hit Points, you can mark a Stress to reduce the number of Hit Points they mark by 1.

Devout.name: Devout
Devout.description: When you roll your Prayer Dice, you can roll an additional die and discard the lowest result. Additionally, you can use your “Sparing Touch” feature twice instead of once per long rest.

Elementalist.name: Elementalist
Elementalist.description:
Choose one of the following elements at character creation: air, earth, fire, lightning, water.

You can shape this element into harmless effects. Additionally, spend a Hope and describe how your control over this element helps an action roll you’re about to make, then either gain a +2 bonus to the roll or a +3 bonus to the roll’s damage.

rxuFLfHP1FILDpds.name: Bonus to Roll
rxuFLfHP1FILDpds.description: Spend a Hope and describe how your control over this element helps an action roll you’re about to make, gain a +2 bonus to the roll.

S7HvFD3qIR3ifJRL.name: Bonus to Damage
S7HvFD3qIR3ifJRL.description: Spend a Hope and describe how your control over this element helps an action roll you’re about to make, gain a +3 bonus to the roll’s damage.

Elemental Aura.name: Elemental Aura
Elemental Aura.description:
Once per rest while Channeling, you can assume an aura matching your element. The aura affects targets within Close range until your Channeling ends.

  • Fire: When an adversary marks 1 or more Hit Points, they must also mark a Stress.

  • Earth: Your allies gain a +1 bonus to Strength.

  • Water: When an adversary deals damage to you, you can mark a Stress to move them anywhere within Very Close range of where they are.

  • Air: When you or an ally takes damage from an attack beyond Melee range, reduce the damage by 1d8.

AdOnKhi7g6zQu2iv.name: Fire
AdOnKhi7g6zQu2iv.description: When an adversary marks 1 or more Hit Points, they must also mark a Stress.

xDBLH5TWidvrYF7z.name: Earth
xDBLH5TWidvrYF7z.description: When an adversary marks 1 or more Hit Points, they must also mark a Stress.

S4t5HlgxWlHwaBDw.name: Water
S4t5HlgxWlHwaBDw.description: When an adversary deals damage to you, you can mark a Stress to move them anywhere within Very Close range of where they are.

hAsKFFewtTqd1gg9.name: Air
hAsKFFewtTqd1gg9.description: When you or an ally takes damage from an attack beyond Melee range, reduce the damage by 1d8.

Elemental Dominion.name: Elemental Dominion
Elemental Dominion.description:
You further embody your element. While Channeling, you gain the following benefit:

  • Fire: You gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for attacks and spells that deal damage.

  • Earth: When you would mark Hit Points, roll a d6 per Hit Point marked. For each result of 6, reduce the number of Hit Points you mark by 1.

  • Water: When an attack against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress to make the attacker temporarily Vulnerable.

  • Air: You gain a +1 bonus to your Evasion and can fly

ofdSzqY7IfAy5ayv.name: Fire
ofdSzqY7IfAy5ayv.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for attacks and spells that deal damage.

knGm3snaplWYDaue.name: Earth
knGm3snaplWYDaue.description: When you would mark Hit Points, roll a d6 per Hit Point marked. For each result of 6, reduce the number of Hit Points you mark by 1.

MocaqHUdyVwH0ZFu.name: Water
MocaqHUdyVwH0ZFu.description: When an attack against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress to make the attacker temporarily Vulnerable.

AQMNJRmVyhJTSCfR.name: Air
AQMNJRmVyhJTSCfR.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Evasion and can fly.

FoBFRSXRfGa1zkiX.name: Elemental Dominion (Fire)
FoBFRSXRfGa1zkiX.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for attacks and spells that deal damage.

bGwFZZT4juuaIRmZ.name: Elemental Dominion (Water)
bGwFZZT4juuaIRmZ.description: When an attack against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress to make the attacker temporarily Vulnerable.

edF2zvvlcGf54r2n.name: Elemental Dominion (Air)
edF2zvvlcGf54r2n.description: You gain a +1 bonus to your Evasion and can fly

Elemental Incarnation.name: Elemental Incarnation
Elemental Incarnation.description:
Mark a Stress to Channel one of the following elements until you take Severe damage or until your next rest:

  • Fire: When an adversary within Melee range deals damage to you, they take 1d10 magic damage.

  • Earth: Gain a bonus to your damage thresholds equal to your Proficiency.

  • Water: When you deal damage to an adversary within Melee range, all other adversaries within Very Close range must mark a Stress.

  • Air: You can hover, gaining advantage on Agility Rolls.

wVGSzAnJGs5eXKqI.name: Fire
wVGSzAnJGs5eXKqI.description: When an adversary within Melee range deals damage to you, they take @Damage[type:magical|value:1d10].

6QXTThhnJpGDIvhJ.name: Earth
6QXTThhnJpGDIvhJ.description: Gain a bonus to your damage thresholds equal to your Proficiency.

pY2EdEMoyLGYWjK5.name: Water
pY2EdEMoyLGYWjK5.description:
When you deal damage to an adversary within Melee range, all other adversaries within Very Close range must mark a Stress.

@Template[type:emanation|range:vc]

uk8EgHMxCgoWENzt.name: Air
uk8EgHMxCgoWENzt.description: You can hover, gaining advantage on Agility Rolls.

3ck6CeapLxQVjE2W.name: Elemental Incarnation (Air)
3ck6CeapLxQVjE2W.description: You can hover, gaining advantage on Agility Rolls.

Eloquent.name: Eloquent
Eloquent.description:
Your moving words boost morale. Once per session, when you encourage an ally, you can do one of the following:

  • Allow them to find a mundane object or tool they need.

  • Help an Ally without spending Hope.

  • Give them an additional downtime move during their next rest.

Elusive Predator.name: Elusive Predator
Elusive Predator.description: When your Focus makes an attack against you, you gain a +2 bonus to your Evasion against the attack.

X4llFOcAcdJLbear.name: Elusive Predator
X4llFOcAcdJLbear.description: When your Focus makes an attack against you, you gain a +2 bonus to your Evasion against the attack.

Enchanted Aid.name: Enchanted Aid
Enchanted Aid.description: You can enhance the magic of others with your essence. When you Help an Ally with a Spellcast Roll, you can roll a d8 as your advantage die. Once per long rest, after an ally has made a Spellcast Roll with your help, you can swap the results of their Duality Dice.

n8wSqR967o0pZDLR.name: Swap Dice Results
n8wSqR967o0pZDLR.description: Once per long rest, after an ally has made a Spellcast Roll with your help, you can swap the results of their Duality Dice.

Epic Poetry.name: Epic Poetry
Epic Poetry.description: Your Rally Die increases to a d10. Additionally, when you Help an Ally, you can narrate the moment as if you were writing the tale of their heroism in a memoir. When you do, roll a d10 as your advantage die.

Ethereal Visage.name: Ethereal Visage
Ethereal Visage.description: Your supernatural visage strikes awe and fear. While flying, you have advantage on Presence Rolls. When you succeed with Hope on a Presence Roll, you can remove a Fear from the GM’s Fear pool instead of gaining Hope.

Ns1DcQ8wo47LhlL3.name: Ethereal Visage
Ns1DcQ8wo47LhlL3.description: While flying, you have advantage on Presence Rolls.

Expert Training.name: Expert Training
Expert Training.description: Choose an additional level-up option for your companion.

Face Your Fear.name: Face Your Fear
Face Your Fear.description: When you succeed with Fear on an attack roll, you deal an extra 1d10 magic damage.

Fleeting Shadow.name: Fleeting Shadow
Fleeting Shadow.description: Gain a permanent +1 bonus to your Evasion. You can use your “Shadow Stepper” feature to move within Very Far range.

hsEwoHkNr2qVwm2H.name: Fleeting Shadow
hsEwoHkNr2qVwm2H.description: Gain a permanent +1 bonus to your Evasion. You can use your “Shadow Stepper” feature to move within Very Far range.

Fueled by Fear.name: Fueled by Fear
Fueled by Fear.description: The extra magic damage from your “Face Your Fear” feature increases to 2d10.

Gifted Performer.name: Gifted Performer
Gifted Performer.description:
You can play three different types of songs, once each per long rest; describe how you perform for others to gain the listed benefit:

  • Relaxing Song: You and all allies within Close range clear a Hit Point.

  • Epic Song: Make a target within Close range temporarily Vulnerable.

  • Heartbreaking Song: You and all allies within Close range gain a Hope.

xvs7ZKm93AlnZD3F.name: Relaxing Song
xvs7ZKm93AlnZD3F.description: You and all allies within Close range clear a Hit Point.

QTTgKnhpNE2XHz4u.name: Heartbreaking Song
QTTgKnhpNE2XHz4u.description: You and all allies within Close range gain a Hope.

FK4IdbxluRErfYor.name: Epic Song
FK4IdbxluRErfYor.description: Make a target within Close range temporarily Vulnerable.

Have No Fear.name: Have No Fear
Have No Fear.description: The extra magic damage from your “Face Your Fear” feature increases to 3d10.

Heart of a Poet.name: Heart of a Poet
Heart of a Poet.description: After you make an action roll to impress, persuade, or offend someone, you can spend a Hope to add a d4 to the roll.

pHSfMDmfVQSgqk39.name: Spend Hope
pHSfMDmfVQSgqk39.description: After you make an action roll to impress, persuade, or offend someone, you can spend a Hope to add a [[/r d4]] to the roll.

Honed Expertise.name: Honed Expertise
Honed Expertise.description: When you use an Experience, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, you can use it without spending Hope.

zCTrqPtGARSZ06CU.name: Roll d6
zCTrqPtGARSZ06CU.description: When you use an Experience, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, you can use it without spending Hope.

Iron Will.name: Iron Will
Iron Will.description: When you take physical damage, you can mark an additional Armor Slot to reduce the severity.

htEDIjCEWYtznpRV.name: Iron Will
htEDIjCEWYtznpRV.description: When you take physical damage, you can mark an additional Armor Slot to reduce the severity.

Loyal Friend.name: Loyal Friend
Loyal Friend.description: Once per long rest, when the damage from an attack would mark your companion’s last Stress or your last Hit Point and you’re within Close range of each other, you or your companion can rush to the other’s side and take that damage instead.

Z82YQzYWo4eektMa.name: Rush
Z82YQzYWo4eektMa.description: Once per long rest, when the damage from an attack would mark your companion’s last Stress or your last Hit Point and you’re within Close range of each other, you or your companion can rush to the other’s side and take that damage instead.

Loyal Protector.name: Loyal Protector
Loyal Protector.description: When an ally within Close range has 2 or fewer Hit Points and would take damage, you can mark a Stress to sprint to their side and take the damage instead.

Dxnu3gPSTSysJnb8.name: Mark Stress
Dxnu3gPSTSysJnb8.description: When an ally within Close range has 2 or fewer Hit Points and would take damage, you can mark a Stress to sprint to their side and take the damage instead.

Maestro.name: Maestro
Maestro.description: Your rallying songs steel the courage of those who listen. When you give a Rally Die to an ally, they can gain a Hope or clear a Stress.

Manipulate Magic.name: Manipulate Magic
Manipulate Magic.description:
Your primal origin allows you to modify the essence of magic itself. After you cast a spell or make an attack using a weapon that deals magic damage, you can mark a Stress to do one of the following:

  • Extend the spell or attack’s reach by one range

  • Gain a +2 bonus to the action roll’s result

  • Double a damage die of your choice

  • Hit an additional target within range

KL5l4QJjPtDiDBSv.name: Manipulate
KL5l4QJjPtDiDBSv.description:
Your primal origin allows you to modify the essence of magic itself. After you cast a spell or make an attack using a weapon that deals magic damage, you can mark a Stress to do one of the following:

  • Extend the spell or attack’s reach by one range

  • Gain a +2 bonus to the action roll’s result

  • Double a damage die of your choice

  • Hit an additional target within range

Martial Preparation.name: Martial Preparation
Martial Preparation.description: You’re an inspirational warrior to all who travel with you. Your party gains access to the Martial Preparation downtime move. To use this move during a rest, describe how you instruct and train with your party. You and each ally who chooses this downtime move gain a d6 Slayer Die. A PC with a Slayer Die can spend it to roll the die and add the result to an attack or damage roll of their choice.

Natural Evasion.name: Natural Evasion
Natural Evasion.description: You can call forth your element to protect you from harm. When an attack roll against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress and describe how you use your element to defend you. When you do, roll a d6 and add its result to your Evasion against the attack.

amJMKDdSgJHsOsOB.name: Evade
amJMKDdSgJHsOsOB.description: You can call forth your element to protect you from harm. When an attack roll against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress and describe how you use your element to defend you. When you do, roll a d6 and add its result to your Evasion against the attack.

Nemesis.name: Nemesis
Nemesis.description: Spend 2 Hope to Prioritize an adversary until your next rest. When you make an attack against your Prioritized adversary, you can swap the results of your Hope and Fear Dice. You can only Prioritize one adversary at a time.

Rgc7kBmU3kjHKvfx.name: Spend Hope
Rgc7kBmU3kjHKvfx.description: Spend 2 Hope to Prioritize an adversary until your next rest. When you make an attack against your Prioritized adversary, you can swap the results of your Hope and Fear Dice. You can only Prioritize one adversary at a time.

JoBFHkhLbm4JyuZm.name: Nemesis
JoBFHkhLbm4JyuZm.description: When you make an attack against your Prioritized adversary, you can swap the results of your Hope and Fear Dice. You can only Prioritize one adversary at a time.

Partner-in-Arms.name: Partner-in-Arms
Partner-in-Arms.description: When an ally within Very Close range takes damage, you can mark an Armor Slot to reduce the severity by one threshold.

D6ClOGDgu6cLanjE.name: Mark Armor Slot
D6ClOGDgu6cLanjE.description: When an ally within Very Close range takes damage, you can mark an Armor Slot to reduce the severity by one threshold.

Path Forward.name: Path Forward
Path Forward.description: When you’re traveling to a place you’ve previously visited or you carry an object that has been at the location before, you can identify the shortest, most direct path to your destination.

Perfect Recall.name: Perfect Recall
Perfect Recall.description: Once per rest, when you recall a domain card in your vault, you can reduce its Recall Cost by 1.

rFZj0ZsnJCc0PS3h.name: Recall
rFZj0ZsnJCc0PS3h.description: Once per rest, when you recall a domain card in your vault, you can reduce its Recall Cost by 1.

Power of the Gods.name: Power of the Gods
Power of the Gods.description: While flying, you deal an extra 1d12 damage instead of 1d8 from your “Wings of Light” feature.

Prepared.name: Prepared
Prepared.description: Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Touch a creature and spend 3 Hope. That creature clears 1d4 Hit Points.

kD2kWWj0oR7ZxyVs.name: Heal a creature
kD2kWWj0oR7ZxyVs.description: Touch a creature and spend 3 Hope. That creature clears 1d4 Hit Points.

Regenerative Reach.name: Regenerative Reach
Regenerative Reach.description: You can target creatures within Very Close range with your “Regeneration” feature.

Reliable Backup.name: Reliable Backup
Reliable Backup.description:
You can use your “Contacts Everywhere” feature three times per session. The following options are added to the list of benefits you can choose from when you use that feature:

  • When you mark 1 or more Hit Points, they can rush out to shield you, reducing the Hit Points marked by 1.

  • When you make a Presence Roll in conversation, they back you up. You can roll a d20 as your Hope Die.

Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.description: When an adversary within Melee range succeeds on an attack against you, you can mark 2 Stress to force the attacker to mark a Hit Point.

e00FXbyXZ8bHRY2t.name: Mark Stress
e00FXbyXZ8bHRY2t.description: When an adversary within Melee range succeeds on an attack against you, you can mark 2 Stress to force the attacker to mark a Hit Point.

Rise to the Challenge.name: Rise to the Challenge
Rise to the Challenge.description: You are vigilant in the face of mounting danger. While you have 2 or fewer Hit Points unmarked, you can roll a d20 as your Hope Die.

Rousing Speech.name: Rousing Speech
Rousing Speech.description: Once per long rest, you can give a heartfelt, inspiring speech. All allies within Far range clear 2 Stress.

WNtHiko4DRGbxKnm.name: Talk to your allies!
WNtHiko4DRGbxKnm.description: Once per long rest, you can give a heartfelt, inspiring speech. All allies within Far range clear 2 Stress.

Ruthless Predator.name: Ruthless Predator
Ruthless Predator.description: When you make a damage roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency. Additionally, when you deal Severe damage to an adversary, they must mark a Stress.

0YRLL1HC4XS3tX00.name: Mark Stress
0YRLL1HC4XS3tX00.description: When you make a damage roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency. Additionally, when you deal Severe damage to an adversary, they must mark a Stress.

8BNwCS7ueIQuvn2M.name: Ruthless Predator
8BNwCS7ueIQuvn2M.description: When you make a damage roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency. Additionally, when you deal Severe damage to an adversary, they must mark a Stress.

Sacred Resonance.name: Sacred Resonance
Sacred Resonance.description: When you roll damage for your “Spirit Weapon” feature, if any of the die results match, double the value of each matching die. For example, if you roll two 5s, they count as two 10s.

Shadow Stepper.name: Shadow Stepper
Shadow Stepper.description: You can move from shadow to shadow. When you move into an area of darkness or a shadow cast by another creature or object, you can mark a Stress to disappear from where you are and reappear inside another shadow within Far range. When you reappear, you are Cloaked.

g1VIG6VjYKkm11qJ.name: Mark Stress
g1VIG6VjYKkm11qJ.description: You can move from shadow to shadow. When you move into an area of darkness or a shadow cast by another creature or object, you can mark a Stress to disappear from where you are and reappear inside another shadow within Far range. When you reappear, you are Cloaked.

RYri0b9z5kq74U5n.name: Shadow Stepper: Cloaked
RYri0b9z5kq74U5n.description: You can move from shadow to shadow. When you move into an area of darkness or a shadow cast by another creature or object, you can mark a Stress to disappear from where you are and reappear inside another shadow within Far range. When you reappear, you are Cloaked.

Slayer.name: Slayer
Slayer.description: You gain a pool of dice called Slayer Dice. On a roll with Hope, you can place a d6 on this card instead of gaining a Hope, adding the die to the pool. You can store a number of Slayer Dice equal to your Proficiency. When you make an attack roll or damage roll, you can spend any number of these Slayer Dice, rolling them and adding their result to the roll. At the end of each session, clear any unspent Slayer Dice on this card and gain a Hope per die cleared.

Sparing Touch.name: Sparing Touch
Sparing Touch.description: Once per long rest, touch a creature and clear 2 Hit Points or 2 Stress from them.

aanLNQkeO2ZTIqBl.name: Clear Hit Points
aanLNQkeO2ZTIqBl.description: Once per long rest, touch a creature and clear 2 Hit Points or 2 Stress from them.

cWdzCQJv8RFfi2NR.name: Clear Stress
cWdzCQJv8RFfi2NR.description: Once per long rest, touch a creature and clear 2 Hit Points or 2 Stress from them.

Spirit Weapon.name: Spirit Weapon
Spirit Weapon.description: When you have an equipped weapon with a range of Melee or Very Close, it can fly from your hand to attack an adversary within Close range and then return to you. You can mark a Stress to target an additional adversary within range with the same attack roll.

TDvWFqAxu7V33UIC.name: Target Additional Adversary
TDvWFqAxu7V33UIC.description: You can mark a Stress to target an additional adversary within range with the same attack roll.

Thrive in Chaos.name: Thrive in Chaos
Thrive in Chaos.description: When you succeed on an attack, you can mark a Stress after rolling damage to force the target to mark an additional Hit Point.

7Z9v7GWswIQFD5YH.name: Mark Stress
7Z9v7GWswIQFD5YH.description: When you succeed on an attack, you can mark a Stress after rolling damage to force the target to mark an additional Hit Point.

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.description:
Once per long rest, you can transform into a physical manifestation of your element. When you do, describe your transformation and choose two of the following benefits to gain until your next rest:

  • +4 bonus to your Severe threshold

  • +1 bonus to a character trait of your choice

  • +1 bonus to your Proficiency

  • +2 bonus to your Evasion

RIbyJjEkCgqoDmyn.name: Transform
RIbyJjEkCgqoDmyn.description:
Once per long rest, you can transform into a physical manifestation of your element. When you do, describe your transformation and choose two of the following benefits to gain until your next rest:

  • +4 bonus to your Severe threshold

  • +1 bonus to a character trait of your choice

  • +1 bonus to your Proficiency

  • +2 bonus to your Evasion

cTgSmxkTi89y6sbc.name: Bonus to Trait
cTgSmxkTi89y6sbc.description: +1 bonus to a character trait of your choice

Undaunted.name: Undaunted
Undaunted.description: Gain a permanent +3 bonus to your damage thresholds.

zggFRaerHCj1e5F5.name: Undaunted
zggFRaerHCj1e5F5.description: Gain a permanent +3 bonus to your damage thresholds.

Unrelenting.name: Unrelenting
Unrelenting.description: Gain a permanent +2 bonus to your damage thresholds.

IKb6yutns8EJZ49M.name: Unrelenting
IKb6yutns8EJZ49M.description: Gain a permanent +2 bonus to your damage thresholds.

Unwavering.name: Unwavering
Unwavering.description: Gain a permanent +1 bonus to your damage thresholds.

3wexvo6La4V46aiX.name: Unwavering
3wexvo6La4V46aiX.description: Gain a permanent +1 bonus to your damage thresholds.

Vanishing Act.name: Vanishing Act
Vanishing Act.description: Mark a Stress to become Cloaked at any time. When Cloaked from this feature, you automatically clear the Restrained condition if you have it. You remain Cloaked in this way until you roll with Fear or until your next rest.

BjAECQULugmbVqXU.name: Mark Stress
BjAECQULugmbVqXU.description: Mark a Stress to become Cloaked at any time. When Cloaked from this feature, you automatically clear the Restrained condition if you have it. You remain Cloaked in this way until you roll with Fear or until your next rest.

czrwqq44sEr0uJ8O.name: Vanishing Act: Cloaked
czrwqq44sEr0uJ8O.description: When Cloaked from this feature, you automatically clear the Restrained condition if you have it. You remain Cloaked in this way until you roll with Fear or until your next rest.

Virtuoso.name: Virtuoso
Virtuoso.description: You are among the greatest of your craft and your skill is boundless. You can perform each of your "Gifted Performer" feature’s songs twice per long rest.

Warden’s Protection.name: Warden’s Protection
Warden’s Protection.description: Once per long rest, spend 2 Hope to clear 2 Hit Points on 1d4 allies within Close range.

ozYzhQfRt5sp19di.name: Healing
ozYzhQfRt5sp19di.description: Once per long rest, spend 2 Hope to clear 2 Hit Points on [[/r 1d4]] allies within Close range.

Weapon Specialist.name: Weapon Specialist
Weapon Specialist.description: You can wield multiple weapons with dangerous ease. When you succeed on an attack, you can spend a Hope to add one of the damage dice from your secondary weapon to the damage roll. Additionally, once per long rest when you roll your Slayer Dice, reroll any 1s.

vay9rVXJS3iksaVR.name: Spend Hope
vay9rVXJS3iksaVR.description: You can wield multiple weapons with dangerous ease. When you succeed on an attack, you can spend a Hope to add one of the damage dice from your secondary weapon to the damage roll.

1bBFfxmywJpx5tfk.name: Reroll
1bBFfxmywJpx5tfk.description: Additionally, once per long rest when you roll your Slayer Dice, reroll any 1s.

Well-Connected.name: Well-Connected
Well-Connected.description:
When you arrive in a prominent town or environment, you know somebody who calls this place home. Give them a name, note how you think they could be useful, and choose one fact from the following list:

  • They owe me a favor, but they’ll be hard to find.

  • They’re going to ask for something in exchange.

  • They’re always in a great deal of trouble.

  • We used to be together. It’s a long story.

  • We didn’t part on great terms.

Wings of Light.name: Wings of Light
Wings of Light.description:
You can fly. While flying, you can do the following:

  • Mark a Stress to pick up and carry another willing creature approximately your size or smaller.

  • Spend a Hope to deal an extra 1d8 damage on a successful attack.

rg2sLCTqY2rTo861.name: Mark Stress
rg2sLCTqY2rTo861.description: Mark a Stress to pick up and carry another willing creature approximately your size or smaller.

1qjnoz5I7NqrWMkp.name: Spend Hope
1qjnoz5I7NqrWMkp.description: Spend a Hope to deal an extra 1d8 damage on a successful attack.

PfCwuVbKLxhnrm9X.name: Wings of Light
PfCwuVbKLxhnrm9X.description: Deal an extra 1d8 damage on a successful attack.

Beastbound.name: Звериные Узы
Beastbound.description: Играйте за Звериные Узы, если хотите иметь глубокую связь с животным-союзником.

Call Of The Brave.name: Зов Храбреца
Call Of The Brave.description: Играйте за Зов Храбреца, если хотите использовать мощь своих врагов для увеличения собственной силы.

Call Of The Slayer.name: Зов Истребителя
Call Of The Slayer.description: Играйте за Зов Истребителя, если хотите поражать врагов с невероятной мощью.

Divine Wielder.name: Божественный Воитель
Divine Wielder.description: Играйте за Божественного Воитель, если хотите господствовать на поле боя с легендарным оружием.

Elemental Origin.name: Стихийное Начало
Elemental Origin.description: Играйте за Стихийное Начало, если хотите использовать сырую магию, придав ей форму определенного элемента.

Nightwalker.name: Тень
Nightwalker.description: Играйте за Тень, если хотите управлять тенями, чтобы перемещаться по местности.

Primal Origin.name: Первозданное Начало
Primal Origin.description: Играйте за Первозданное Начало, если хотите значительно расширить возможности ваших заклинаний.

School Of Knowledge.name: Школа Знаний
School Of Knowledge.description: Играйте за Школу Знаний, если хотите обладать глубокими познаниями об окружающем вас мире.

School Of War.name: Школа Войны
School Of War.description: Играйте за Школу Войны, если хотите использовать отработанную магию в качестве средства насилия.

Stalwart.name: Заступник
Stalwart.description: Играйте за Заступника, если хотите выдерживать мощные удары и продолжать сражаться.

Syndicate.name: Синдикат
Syndicate.description: Играйте за Синдикат, если хотите иметь широкую сеть контактов, куда бы вы ни пошли.

Troubadour.name: Трубадур
Troubadour.description: Играйте за Трубадура, если хотите поддержать своих союзников музыкой.

Vengeance.name: Мститель
Vengeance.description: Играйте за Мстителя, если хотите сразить неприятелей, причиняющих вред вам или вашим союзникам.

Warden of Renewal.name: Хранитель Жизни
Warden of Renewal.description: Играйте за Хранителя Жизни, если хотите использовать мощную магию для исцеления вашей команды.

Warden of the Elements.name: Хранитель Стихий
Warden of the Elements.description: Играйте за Хранителя Стихий, если хотите воплотить в себе естественные элементы дикой природы.

Wayfinder.name: Путевод
Wayfinder.description: Играйте за Путевода, если хотите хотите охотиться на свою жертву и поражать цели смертоносной силой.

Winged Sentinel.name: Крылатый Страж
Winged Sentinel.description: Играйте за Крылатого Стража, если хотите взмыть в небеса и нанести сокрушительные удары с воздуха.

Wordsmith.name: Оратор
Wordsmith.description: Играйте за Оратора, если хотите применять искусные игры слов и завораживать публику.
